description:
Eric is Corey's brother. Corey called the other day and said that his brother had just moved into town and was interested in doing some films. So being the cock hound I am I invited them over.
When they arrived, I went out to meet them and my jaw just about hit the pavement. Walking toward me were these two muscular, clean-cut, drop-dead-gorgeous young studs. Eric is a little taller than Corey but they both have piercing baby blue eyes... you can definitely see the resemblance in their faces.
In the video, Eric mentions that there is also a third brother. Hmmmm....
Eric is straight but he told me he was curious about fucking and getting fucked by another guy. One thing is for sure though... both brothers know how to shoot a load. Eric's first spurt flies past his shoulder and lands on the pillow!
title: Eric
